text: The Melaka Sultanate Watermill () is a watermill in Melaka City, Melaka, Malaysia located along the bank of Melaka River. It is the first and largest watermill in Malaysia. ==History== The watermill was built in 2007 and completed in March 2008. ==Architecture== The watermill stands at a height of 13 meters and built based on Islamic technology found in Syria and China. ==See also== * List of tourist attractions in Melaka ==References== Category:Buildings and structures in Malacca City Category:2008 establishments in Malaysia Category:Watermills
title: Melaka Sultanate Watermill
